channel.title: GOG Galaxy- finally, a worthy challenger to Steam?
channel.description:
[url]https://www.gametrailers.com/news-post/75345/gog-galaxy-is-a-drm-free-platform-that-may-compete-against-steam[/url]
If they keep the promises they make in this video, this could be a really cool client. I wonder if Cross Play could extend to friends lists in other clients like Steam or Origin? (Highly unlikely, but I'd love it if they could do that.)

item.title: GOG Galaxy- finally, a worthy challenger to Steam?
item.dc:creator: Mr_Sir_Shpee
item.description:
At first, I wasn’t too interested because I don’t use GOG. I only got it to get the free Fallout games, which I haven’t even played. This cross-play intrigues me though. Very cool idea. Honestly don’t know what I’d buy though, except maybe System Shock 2, but I can get that for $2.50 on Steam Sale. On that topic, if anyone’s played it, would you recommend the Steam or GOG version of SS2?
